content: Some folks in Debian are running into https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/66118 , which is now hitting more mainstream architectures. Are there any debuginfo folks around who might be able to take a look at that?
I have some experience in this area, so Iâ€™ll add this to my (slow) holiday queue to take a look. ðŸ˜„
Is it particularly urgent, or just nice to have fixed...?
More urgent than "would be nice", less urgent than "hair on fire". ;)
There's a current workaround, but that workaround shouldn't be needed and it's causing some issues.
Okay, thanks for the guidance on priority. :smile:
